name: Giga City Streets #2
description: Sonia Mariko - ascent from street-savvy enforcer to the fearsome mafiosa was as rapid as it was ruthless. With razor-sharp intelligence and a shrewd understanding of the digital underworld, Sofia had her finger on the city's virtual pulse. She commanded a legion of augmented mercenaries, and her cyber-empire controlled everything from data heists to shadowy dealings.
